original_text: Israelites, how happy you are! There is no other nation like you. The Lord himself has rescued you. He is the one who keeps you safe, like a soldier's shield. He is like a sword that you use to win against your enemies. Your enemies will fall down with fear in front of you. You will walk all over them.’ Israelites, how happy you are! There is no other nation like you. The Lord himself has rescued you. He is the one who keeps you safe, like a soldier's shield. He is like a sword that you use to win against your enemies. korean_text: 이스라엘이여 너는 행복한 사람이로다 여호와의 구원을 너 같이 얻은 백성이 누구냐 그는 너를 돕는 방패시요 네 영광의 칼이시로다 네 대적이 네게 복종하리니 네가 그들의 높은 곳을 밟으리로다

sentences.original_text: There is no other nation like you.
The Lord himself has rescued you.
He is the one who keeps you safe
that you use to win against your enemies.
Your enemies will fall down with fear
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 원수들이 두려움에 떨며 쓰러질 것이다.

sentences.original_text: You will walk all over them.
